content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"At the moment, for access to the Internet (NOT EPAM internal sites and applications) EPAM guests (customers and partners) are provided with special guest wi-fi accounts. Such accounts are created by Service Desk (Contact Center) during monitoring in Balancer using a special portal:\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://guestwifi.epam.com/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"https://guestwifi.epam.com\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"2 types of accounts can be created in the portal:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"-       personal accounts. Maximum access duration of such accounts is 14 calendar days. Access is allowed from maximum 3 devices\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"-       group (impersonal) accounts are created for mass events. Maximum access duration is 5 calendar days. Access is allowed from maximum 100 devices\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Requests for guest wi-fi accounts creation are considered of Critical priority and must be resolved within 15 minutes.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Exception:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"if start date of guest wi-fi account in in the future (on the next day or later) it is considered of average priority and can be assigned to EPAM – Service Desk Processing Center to be created during the day.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Learn how a Wi-Fi account is created in WI “\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://sharepoint.epam.com/project/epm-help/_layouts/15/WopiFrame.aspx?sourcedoc=/project/epm-help/Shared%20Documents/PMC%20Instructions/Wi-Fi%20Access%20for%20EPAM%20Guests(new).docx&action=default&DefaultItemOpen=1\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"WiFi Access for EPAM Guests\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"”.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Ask your curator to practice creation of guest wi-fi accounts with average priority.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
